name: 巫-Less is More
description:
Its not the greatest roguelike, but it follows a neat gimmick where your health and inventory share slots. If you pick up that weapon, you'll be down one heart until you drop it. Its based on Shintoism, which my grandparents practice, and lots of its enemies are Shinto kami. Tip : Don't hold down keys, it gets finicky when you do that.

This was written in a custom engine for the Blackthornprod Game Jam.

Credit for the SFX used is in the compressed file.

(BTW, the kanji is an archaic form of Miko or shrine maiden, I chose it so the title screen could be mirrored and symmetrical.)
